inventory=[{"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 58, "index": 13}, {"type": "rabbit_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 17}, {"type": "light_gray_stained_glass", "quantity": 36, "index": 19}, {"type": "ender_chest", "quantity": 47, "index": 24}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 6, "index": 26}, {"type": "oak_trapdoor", "quantity": 41, "index": 34}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 12, "index": 38}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 40}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 42}]
thought: I need to place three iron ingots vertically in the crafting grid to craft iron bars. There is one iron ingot at slot 26, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1
